how-do-we-relationship.title: How Do We Relationship
how-do-we-relationship.review: Holy frick I love this manga so much. It’s such a rollercoaster of emotions and I love how the characters grow and the art mmmm. AND TAMAKI I LOVE YOU GIRL YOU COULD NEVER DO ANY HARM (well i guess except for that bad communication phase in chapters 97-106 (you will know when you get there)) BUT SHE IS BEST GIRL YOU COULD NEVER MAKE ME HATE HER and I’m so sad about the ending she got – like noooo tamakiiii :(.

nakinagi.title: NakiNagi
nakinagi.review:
The art and paneling is soooo pretty. Also the yuri subtext is peak – I really hope it becomes yuri and Nagisa doesn’t end up with that blank slate of a guy. I love Nakika and her smiles so much. Love ch 5.5. 
 Just found out that it was cancelled and next week is the final chapter. This makes me sad like you can’t even believe. 
 It’s about this girl who’s pursuing this guy and this other girl is helping her and omg holy shit the girls’ relationship is so peak and Nakika is so pretty and cool and I love her so much. And the guy was so bland but there were hints of yuri and the hints have been getting stronger especially with chapter 36, so I scavenged for anyone discussing it and find out it was cancelled ahhsakdahjsd 
 Legit so good so sad that it was cancelled

my-moms-a-superstar.title: My Mom's a Superstar
my-moms-a-superstar.review: this author always has goated artwork. Also it’s celebrity x celebrity which I always love — feeds into that parasocial mindset :p. the backstory chapters were so wholesome and I love their dynamic and little yougi? is so adorable. Also, the other invokes the we can’t be together because of x societal circumstances trope in the flashback scenes, which I love — sort of was doomed but not anymore yuri which makes me happy

there-is-no-love-wishing-upon-a-star.title: There is No Love Wishing Upon a Star
there-is-no-love-wishing-upon-a-star.review: I love these guys so much. Also, I love all of this author's works. She is the angst queen

her-tale-of-shim-chong.title: Her Tale of Shim Chong
her-tale-of-shim-chong.review: This is peak shit right here. You like historical yuri? This is it. You don't like historical yuri? Still go read it

bloom-into-you.title: Bloom into You
bloom-into-you.review: My first yuri so it will always hold a special place in my heart.

i-want-to-love-you-till-your-dying-day.title: I Want To Love You Till Your Dying Day
i-want-to-love-you-till-your-dying-day.review: As you can tell by the title, it's very wholesome

the-moon-on-a-rainy-night.title: The Moon on a Rainy Night

getting-to-know-grace.title: Getting to Know Grace
getting-to-know-grace.review: GO READ THIS SHIT NOWWWWWW DOO ITTT

tokubetsu-na-chuutohanpa.title: Tokubetsu na Chuutohanpa
tokubetsu-na-chuutohanpa.review: Just stupid teenagers figuring out their feelings and how to romance, which means it's an emotional rollercoaster yayyyy. But they're also not so bad at it that it gets infuriating. Like they'll solve their issues pretty quick...i think...if i remmeber correctly

the-summer-you-were-there.title: The Summer You Were There
the-summer-you-were-there.review: so we're getting reallly goood vibes from this title. It ends very happy and wholesome 1000% trust me bro

my-goddess-spurs-me-on.title: My Goddess Spurs Me On
my-goddess-spurs-me-on.review: So here's the secret: this is an anthology of one shots *gasp*, but they're all really good for the most part and the art is really pretty and this author is pretty goated at writing one shots in general, so go check out their works

the-anemone-feels-the-heat.title: The Anemone Feels the Heat
the-anemone-feels-the-heat.review: I love the main couple so much and you will too

love-bullet.title: Love Bullet
love-bullet.review: The character designs are sooo cute and damn the fight choreography – the author probably beats people up on the side

this-monster-wants-to-eat-me.title: This Monster Wants to Eat Me
this-monster-wants-to-eat-me.review: They be cooking with the yokai designs

show-me-your-bust.title: Show Me Your Bust
show-me-your-bust.review: Sussy title with sussy plot but wait its actually getting pretty good and ooh is this longing yuri I see? mmmmmmm ooh angsty yuri is my weakness. BUT DAMN THE RELEASE SCHEDULE IS KILLING ME

my-girlfriend-is-devilishly-sweet.title: My Girlfriend is Devilishly Sweet
my-girlfriend-is-devilishly-sweet.__comment: review: All hail runa, my aroace queen
my-girlfriend-is-devilishly-sweet.review: Fluffy fluff fluff. Everyone is friends in kumbaya. There are hints of dread, but don’t worry everything ends up fine. Also succubus

my-girlfriend-limited-to-7-days.title: Girlfriend Limited to 7 Days
my-girlfriend-limited-to-7-days.review: Manatsu is such a breath of fresh air – her journey of discovery, her forward nature, and her plethora of stupid faces. She's just so adorable

goodbye-my-rose-garden.title: Goodbye, My Rose Garden
goodbye-my-rose-garden.review: More historical yuri???! Don't mind if I do

ano-ko-to-futari-de.title: Ano Ko to Futari de.
ano-ko-to-futari-de.review: It’s so fluffy and wholesome and the art is so pretty and I love the way the characters dress

be-happy-in-the-real-world-too-okay.title: Be Happy in the Real World Too, Okay?
be-happy-in-the-real-world-too-okay.review: Ngl kinda basic so far but sometimes we need that simple comfort food yuri. And I love Olivia. Oh the pain.

the-star-next-door.title: The Star Next Door
the-star-next-door.review: So she's got baggage, but that just means more angst for me nom nom nom. And they're relationship is so wholesome and they just want the best for each other and holy art

monthly-in-the-garden-with-my-landlord.title: Monthly in the Garden with My Landlord

even-if-it-was-just-once-i-regret-it.title: Even If It Was Just Once, I Regret It
even-if-it-was-just-once-i-regret-it.review: Legit don't remember what happens in this beyond the basic synopsis, but I wrote it down as being pretty good so it must be right?
